import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import SignupValidation from './SignupValidation' function Signup() { const[values,setValues] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'' }) const[errors,setErrors] = useState({}) const handleInput = (event) =>{ setValues(prev => ({...prev,[event.target.name]:[event.target.value]})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setErrors(SignupValidation(values));} return (

) } export default Signup
